topic_metadata.title: Is there a way to replace Hexo/other CMS's formula system with typst's formula?

posts.name: Dexter Chen
posts.cooked: I’ve been using typst for nearly 8 months and I now found it har to use the LaTeX formula in my hexo blog. Is it possible to replace it with typst’s formula system? Or is there a a way to output typst’s formula as an svg file and insert it manually as a temporary solution? Thx.

posts.cooked:
Hello @Dexter_Chen, you can take a look at this blog which explains how to do this using typst.ts.
